basic_info.motto: The entrepeneur of this age is one who discovers where the world is going and goes there first.
basic_info.summary:
I am an aspiring web and software developer with an established background in customer service. I started out working in
small boutiques building soft skills like communication. I then went into high-end retail where I honed my abiliuty to anticipate
the needs of a more demanding clientele. From there I joined the United States Air Force which gave me a sense of discipline 
and sparked my passion for problem solving.

education.details: Completed all of the associates level coursework as well as upper divison course focusing on international studies. Minored in hospitality.

experiences.company: United States Air Force Reserve, Homestead
experiences.details:
Maintain the avionics systems on the F-16 Fighting Falcon
  - Troubleshooting malfunctions 
  - Repaing failed systems and connections
  - Performing scheduled maintenance

Assist in managing the day to day operations of the accessories department
  - Providing customer service 
  - Managing invintory and sales metrics 
  - Handing scheduling

Interract with high-end customres. Providing exceptional customer service.
  - Upselling
  - Providing product knowledge
